title: what happen if i Got 14 days suspension twice
body:
Soooo its my second time getting a 14 days suspension what does it mean?
is it a perma ban?
or another 2 weeks suspension to reform?

replies.body: In theory your imminent permban slowly decays over time if you show good behavior, but if you get punished again any time soon, it will be a perm.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZGf8AWlT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-30T00:45:11.242+0000)
>
> In theory your imminent permban slowly decays over ~~time~~ lots of games played if you show good behavior, but if you get punished again any time soon, it will be a perm.

Fixed.

You probably had enough time/games played with good behavior to go back down a tier. So when you broke the rules again, you were at 14 day ban again. Pretty rare but just be careful cuz once again, you're at risk of a permaban.
It could be escalated, some people have delayed punishments where the 14 day ban turns into a perma once they review it.
